languages.text: [draft] Как будто огромный жук кричитКак будто огромный жук кричит

traits.locale_text: [draft] Как будто огромный жук кричитКак будто огромный жук кричит

languages.text: "Слышите? Это не скрип контейнера — воет какая-то тварь. Пытается ли она отпугнуть нас криком или зовет себе подобных? Надо готовиться к худшему".

"Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."
languages.original_text: "Слышите? Это не скрип контейнера — воет какая-то тварь. Пытается ли она отпугнуть нас криком или зовет себе подобных? Надо готовиться к худшему".

traits.locale_text: "Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

"Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

"Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

"Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

"Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

languages.text: 「聞こえるか？あれはコンテナの軋む音なんかじゃない、何かの生物の鳴き声だ。叫び声で我々を脅して追い払おうとしているのか、それとも仲間を呼んでいるのか？最悪の事態に備えた方がいいな」
languages.original_text: "Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

traits.locale_text: 「聞こえるか？あれはコンテナの軋む音なんかじゃない、何かの生物の鳴き声だ。叫び声で我々を脅して追い払おうとしているのか、それとも仲間を呼んでいるのか？最悪の事態に備えた方がいいな」

languages.text: "Hört Ihr das? Das ist nicht das Knarzen eines Containers – da heult irgendeine Kreatur. Sie will uns Angst machen und vertreiben, indem sie schreit, oder ruft sie ihresgleichen? Wir müssen mit dem Schlimmsten rechnen."
languages.original_text: "Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

traits.locale_text: "Hört Ihr das? Das ist nicht das Knarzen eines Containers – da heult irgendeine Kreatur. Sie will uns Angst machen und vertreiben, indem sie schreit, oder ruft sie ihresgleichen? Wir müssen mit dem Schlimmsten rechnen."

languages.text: "Duyuyor musunuz? O ses; konteyner gıcırtısı değil, bir yaratığın uluması. Bağırarak bizi korkutup kaçırmaya mı çalışıyor yoksa kendi akranlarını mı çağırıyor? En kötüsüne hazırlıklı olmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

traits.locale_text: "Duyuyor musunuz? O ses; konteyner gıcırtısı değil, bir yaratığın uluması. Bağırarak bizi korkutup kaçırmaya mı çalışıyor, yoksa kendi akranlarını mı çağırıyor? En kötüsüne hazırlıklı olmalıyız."

languages.text: «¿Oyes eso? No es el crujido de un contenedor: es una criatura aullando. ¿Está intentando ahuyentarnos o llama a su especie? Debemos prepararnos para lo peor».
languages.original_text: "Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

traits.locale_text: «¿Oyes eso? No es el crujido de un contenedor: es una criatura aullando. ¿Está intentando ahuyentarnos o llama a su especie? Debemos prepararnos para lo peor».

languages.text: “你听到了吗？那可不是集装箱的嘎吱声，而是某种怪物的嚎叫。它是打算把我们吓跑，还是在呼唤同伴？我们必须做好最坏的打算。”
languages.original_text: "Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

traits.locale_text: “你听到了吗？那可不是集装箱的嘎吱声，而是某种怪物的嚎叫。它是打算把我们吓跑，还是在呼唤同伴？我们必须做好最坏的打算。”

languages.text: « Vous avez entendu ça ? Ce n'est pas le grincement d'un conteneur. C'est un hurlement de créature. Est-ce qu'elle essaie de nous faire fuir, ou est-ce qu'elle appelle ses congénères ? Mieux vaut se préparer au pire. »
languages.original_text: "Do you hear that? That's not the creaking of a container — it's some kind of creature howling. Is it trying to scare us away by screaming, or is it calling to its own kind? We need to prepare for the worst."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez entendu ça ? Ce n'est pas le grincement d'un conteneur. C'est un hurlement de créature. Est-ce qu'elle essaie de nous faire fuir, ou est-ce qu'elle appelle ses congénères ? Mieux vaut se préparer au pire. »
